TopicTitle: I'm sure it's been mentioned before, but can we see more jets/turbines?

Articles.Content:
I would love to see bigger and smaller turbines. I would also like to see pulse jets, ram jets, and scram jets.

Thanks.
Aircraft and spaceplane parts are overdue an overhaul, but there's no ETA on this, you are better off asking modders to make new engines, which many have already done

Well, sure, they come in just one size. But you can go mach 3 with one jet engine, and mach 7 with the other. Given the limited usage (Kerbin/Laythe only and no saves or timewarps in flight) I think it is quite enough.

A propeller running on electricity and working in any atmosphere would be nice, though.
